name: Bokken
full_description: "A wooden practice sword used for training. Safe and non lethal."

name: Plastic Wand
full_description: "A plastic wand for channeling magic."

name: Pointy Stick
full_description: "A wooden practice sword used for training. Safe and non lethal."

name: Hammer
full_description: "A wooden practice sword used for training. Safe and non lethal."

name: Cloth Armor
full_description: "Simple, lightweight garb that offers almost no physical protection. Comfortable and easy to move in."

name: Cap
full_description: "A basic cap that offers a small boost to Mind Defense and a touch of vitality."

name: Sandles
full_description: Simple footwear that offers a small boost to evasion and initiative.

name: Simple Cuff
short_description: "A simple wrist cuff with a single socket."
full_description: "A plain bracelet fitted with one sigil slot. Good for first-time socketing."

name: Metal Bracelet
full_description: "A metal bracelet with 2 slots. Very sturdy."

name: Fire Sigil
full_description: "A basic Fire sigil that deals minor fire damage to a single enemy."

name: Water Sigil
full_description: A basic Water sigil that deals minor water damage to a single enemy.

name: Earth Sigil
full_description: A basic Earth sigil that deals minor earth damage to a single enemy.

name: Air Sigil
full_description: A basic Air sigil that deals minor air damage to a single enemy.

name: Void Sigil
full_description: A basic Void sigil that deals minor void damage to a single enemy.

name: Data Sigil
full_description: A basic Data sigil that deals minor data damage to a single enemy.

name: Health Drink
full_description: A basic sports drink that restores 50 HP to one ally.

name: Mind Drink
full_description: A basic sports drink that restores 30 MP to one ally.

name: Small Balm
short_description: Restore a small chunk of HP.
full_description: A compact medic balm that restores 100 HP to one ally.

name: Lite Biofoam
short_description: Restore a quarter of max HP.
full_description: Expanding biofoam that restores 25% of Max HP to one ally.

name: Core Biofoam
full_description: Stabilizing biofoam that restores 50% of Max HP to one ally.

name: Prime Biofoam
full_description: Top-grade biofoam that fully restores HP to one ally.

name: Mini Muse Puffer
short_description: Restore a quarter of max MP.
full_description: A small inhaler that restores 25% of Max MP to one ally.

name: Standard Muse Puffer
full_description: A standard inhaler that restores 50% of Max MP to one ally.

name: Max Muse Puffer
full_description: A premium inhaler that fully restores MP to one ally.

name: Vital Recall
full_description: Emergency kit that revives a KO’d ally to 25% HP.

name: Vital Reboot
full_description: Advanced kit that revives a KO’d ally to 50% HP.

name: Total Recharge
full_description: Late-game elixir that fully restores HP and MP to one ally.

name: Protein Shake
full_description: A protein-heavy drink that raises ATK by 25% for 3 rounds.

name: Espresso Shot
full_description: A sharp espresso shot that raises MND by 25% for 3 rounds.

name: Regen Orb
full_description: An orb that grants Regen: 5% MaxHP per round for 5 rounds.

name: Speed Orb
full_description: An orb that grants +10 Speed for 3 rounds (doesn’t stack with footwear; takes higher).

name: Shield Orb
full_description: Creates a barrier that reduces damage taken by 20% for 3 rounds (stacks with Defend multiplicatively).

name: Eye Drops
full_description: Simple eye drops that raise Hit% by 10 for 3 rounds.

name: Hyper Chews
full_description: Sugary chews that raise Eva% by 10 for 3 rounds.

name: Focus Tonic
full_description: Concentrated tonic that raises Skill Hit% by 10 for 3 rounds.

name: Antidote
full_description: A standard antidote that cures Poison.

name: Ointment
full_description: A soothing ointment that cures Burn.

name: Smelling Salts
full_description: Sharp salts that cure Sleep instantly.

name: Heated Blanket
full_description: A heated wrap that cures Freeze.

name: Clarity Water
full_description: Purified water that cures Confusion.

name: Zapper
full_description: A static zap device that cures Charm.

name: Stress Ball
full_description: A squeeze ball that cures Berserk.

name: Pepra
full_description: A strong energy drink that cures Malaise (initiative delay).

name: Vitamin D
full_description: A vitamin that cures Attack Down.

name: Vitamin C
full_description: A vitamin that cures Defense Down.

name: Vitamin B
full_description: A vitamin that cures Mind Down.
